entry.dcterms:title: TÁRKI Omnibus 2000/1. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.
entry.dcterms:creator: Zsadányi-Nagy, Csaba
entry.dcterms:subject: TÁRKI Joint Research Center TDATA-E14: TÁRKI Omnibus 2000/1. Social-political attitudes in Hungary among the adult population.. data sheet. Version: 2009-04-09
entry.dcterms:creator: 1. Gazsó, Tibor
2. Tóth, Zsolt
entry.dcterms:subject: 2004-03-00: the labels of the data file are corrected and complemented
entry.dcterms:description: 1. party preferences and political attitudes, opinions about political players 2. perceptions about the activity of the government and the opposition; satisfaction with democracy; expectations regarding the country's economic situation and personal financial expectations; opinions about the transfer of the Holy Crown to the Parliament buildings; agreement with the January railway strike
entry.dcterms:subject: income, property and savings
cultural and national identity
demography
mass political behavior, attitudes
social behaviour and attitudes
political institutions, public administration
labour and employment
economic conditions and indicators
person
survey data
cross-section

A multi-stage proportionally stratified random probability sample representative of the Hungarian adult population. Unsuccessful inquiries were substituted with supplementary addresses, where persons to be interviewed were selected on the basis of the Leslie Kish key.
face-to-face interview
A
entry.dcterms:rights: Publications based on TÁRKI data collections should acknowledge those sources, primary investigators and depositors.
